name: Alchemy (Unkorunk, marlinara, SmelJey, 90-stick)
description:
Potion brewing simulator for Space Score Jam 12

How to play:
  • Put the seeds from your inventory into the pots to get fruits
  • Put fruits into the brewing things to get ingredients
  • Mix your fruits and ingredients in the cauldron to get potions
  • Sell your potions, ingredients and fruits from your inventory with right mouse button
  • Move with arrows or mouse scroll into the shop to buy new seeds and recipes!
  • Become the richest alchemist in the world! Compete with your friends - get more coins than others.
